sentences.sContent: With children independent in economy from home, the core of home economy assure will transfer from protection to the life saving after retiring.
sentences.sContent_eng: With children independent in economy from home, the core of home economy assure will transfer from protection to the life saving after retiring.
sentences.sCn: 随着孩子们在经济上从家庭中独立出来，家庭经济保障的重心将从保护转移到为退休后的生活储蓄。

sentences.sContent: Or perhaps your spouse has no intention of retiring, which can cause tension if you assumed you'd spend all your time together.
sentences.sContent_eng: Or perhaps your spouse has no intention of retiring, which can cause tension if you assumed you'd spend all your time together.
sentences.sCn: 或者，可能你的配偶还没有任何退休的打算，这时，如果你希望与对方共度时光的话，可能会造成关系紧张。

synos.tran: 退休的；不善社交的；过隐居生活的

phrases.pCn: 退隐，沉默；(沉湎于自己的思想而)离群索居

remMethod.val: 来自retire(v. 退休； 隐居)； re(后) + tir(拉) + e → 向后拉 → 隐居
